title: A HILARIOUS BUDGET, FEW SOLDIERS HAVE A THIRD CHILD: SARATH FONSEKA
content: November 25, 2010: Few soldiers have a third child, says former Army Commander Sarath Fonseka. He made these comments while leaving after the hearing of the white flag case was postponed yesterday. “The hilarious budget has stated that a grant of Rs. 100,000 would be granted to the third child of a soldier. Not one…
